items.description: Change Advisory Board approved the production release window and assigned rollback ownership.
Incident, rollback, and smoke-test runbooks reviewed with on-call engineering and support leads.
All database migrations executed against staging with integrity checks, anonymised backups, and rollback scripts captured.
End-to-end RBAC matrix regression suite passed for instructor, learner, and operator personas across web and mobile.
Reviewed and validated CORS allow-list for production domains with CDN and identity teams; non-production origins remain blocked.
Telemetry dashboards updated with release build identifiers and alert SLOs tuned for new automation surface area.
Support and customer success teams briefed on operator dashboard changes with updated escalation playbooks and macros.
Security and compliance leads uploaded SOC2/ISO control attestations covering new automation, telemetry, and vendor updates.
Environment blueprint SSM parameter, runtime endpoint, and descriptor exported via scripts/infrastructure/describe-environment.mjs with curl verification recorded for the target release window.
`environment_descriptors` registry populated via npm workspace seed, descriptor export archived, and parity API queried to confirm database and manifest hashes align for the target environment.
